children.value: Weekly release: patch version at the end of every week for routine bugfix (anytime for urgent bugfix).
Monthly release: minor version at the end of every month for new features.
Major version release is not included in this schedule for breaking change and new features.
There are style problems when using some functions (inconsistent with the official website), you need to update the UED dependency package to the latest version
Upgrade the @hzero-front-ui/cfg dependency package from Hzero 1.8.x and above to the latest version 4.x
Upgrade the @hzero-front-ui/cfg dependency package from Hzero 1.7.x and above to the latest version 3.x
Upgrade from Hzero 1.7.x and below @hzero-front-ui/c7n-ui, @hzero-front-ui/hzero-ui, @hzero-front-ui/cfg to the latest version 2.x
